title: 2019 Battle Academia Fanart Contest Gallery!
body:
#Here we feature all eligible artworks that were submitted for the 2019 Battle Academia Fanart Contest! Huge thanks to all who participated and congratulations to the winners! The full results announcement can be found [HERE!](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/hIjvqaz6/d/xjj7UzeW)
___
1st Place - [Yuteki](https://imgur.com/a/qLHUJGW)
2nd Place - [Aquallix](https://imgur.com/a/Loif7Gf)
3rd Place - [Flight](https://imgur.com/a/llvqqSV)

Honourable Mention - [NomiNoo](https://imgur.com/gallery/hrjNvxh) - [**Process.gif**](https://www.deviantart.com/daughterofmetis/art/Battle-Academia-Jinx-Progress-GIF-799836945?ga_submit_new=10%3A1559317858)
Honourable Mention - [Matcha Milk Tea](https://imgur.com/WMDlPhN) - [**sirasworn on Instagram**](https://www.instagram.com/sirasworn/)
Honourable Mention - [nexiah](https://www.deviantart.com/nexiah/art/Battlecast-Academia-Kayn-Fan-Art-800091375)
Honourable Mention - [Divorced](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BO6mWm762yTEE5XTQiLkbza8lIb5L75p/view?usp=sharing)
Honourable Mention - [VVhizza](https://imgur.com/eetMkUO)
